pkgmetadata.longdescription: pyforked-daapd Python Library===============================version number: 0.1.14author: Justin WongOverview--------A simple library to interface with an Owntone server.Installation / Usage--------------------To install use pip: $ pip install pyforked-daapdOr clone the repo: $ git clone https://github.com/uvjustin/pyforked-daapd.git $ python setup.py install Contributing------------TBDExample-------TBD
